title: Broadway stars Miranda and Platt release #MarchforOurLives song
text:
Broadway stars Miranda and Platt release #MarchforOurLives song 12:29am EDT - 01:11 
Lin-Manuel Miranda and Ben Platt release a song for the March for Our Lives movement. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Lin-Manuel Miranda and Ben Platt release a song for the March for Our Lives movement. Rough cut (no reporter narration). Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2poQARm
